subject: Handball
Olympic Games (2008)
lead_paragraph: South Korea defeated Japan, 28-25, Wednesday in a replay of a qualifying match for the men’s handball tournament at the Beijing Olympics. The Asian qualifiers were initially held in September, when referees from Jordan and Iran were assigned at the last minute by the Asian Handball Federation to replace German referees.Their disputed calls helped Kuwait win the men’s tournament and Kazakhstan the women’s, qualifying them for the Olympics. In December, the International Handball Federation ordered replays of the qualifiers.The Asian federation has denied match fixing and has said it will punish countries taking part in the replays (Japan and South Korea). South Korea’s women’s team defeated Japan on Tuesday to advance to the Beijing Olympics.
